label: Garden Watering and Irrigation
description: Products and systems for watering and irrigating gardens and plants.
intents: Setting up a drip irrigation system

subcategories.label: Garden Hoses
subcategories.description: Flexible tubes for conveying water in gardens.

subcategories.label: Sprinklers and Watering Cans
subcategories.description: Devices for distributing water over a large area or in a controlled manner.

subcategories.label: Drip Irrigation
subcategories.description: A method of watering plants by applying water slowly and directly to the soil.

subcategories.label: Automatic Watering Systems
subcategories.description: Systems that automate the process of watering plants.
nouns: Automatic watering system for hanging baskets
subtopics: Automatic watering systems for hanging baskets

subcategories.label: Pumps and Filters
subcategories.description: Devices for pumping and filtering water in garden irrigation systems.
